title: Berthe Andiolo
text:
Berthe Andiolo (born Berthe Prudence Ongnomo Andiolo on 15 April 1992) is a <a href="Cameroon">Cameroon</a>ian <a href="women%27s%20soccer">football</a> <a href="forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a>, who plays for <a href="Galatasaray%20S.K.%20%28women%27s%20football%29">Galarasaray</a> in the <a href="Turkish%20Women%27s%20First%20Football%20League">Turkcell Wommen's Football Super Leadue</a> in Turkey. She was a member of the <a href="Cameroon%20women%27s%20national%20football%20team">Cameroon women's national football team</a>.
Andiolo played for the Belarusian <a href="FC%20Minsk%20%28women%29">FC Minsk</a> in 2011. She was a member of Amazone FAP in 2015–2016, <a href="Canon%20Yaound%C3%A9">Canon Yaoundé</a> in 2019, and FC Ebolowa in her country, before she signed a contract for one year with the newly established Turkish team Galatasaray in 2021.
